description: Never-ending trails, fireside sessions, and bike rides in mountain-to-town style—the Men's Aros 1/2-Zip Fleece can do it all! Pillowy-soft sherpa fleece made from 100% recycled polyester will keep you warm on brisk days and nights at the dog park or the campsite. Pull it on as an extra-comfy midlayer on the slopes, or pair it with your most rugged denim jeans, comfiest sweatpants, or sportiest bottoms. This 1/2-zip jacket is a go-to stylish choice for casual, active, and everything in between.
name: Marmot Aros Fleece 1/2 Zip - Mens
